overview:
Greg Martin is a recognized Information Security professional with over 12 years experience and considered an industry expert in Network Security and SIEM technology.

He has been a technical adviser to the FBI, the United States Secret Service, and NASA and has consulted with numerous Fortune 500 corporations, financial institutions, and law enforcement agencies.

Greg is the author of ArcOSI (code.google.com/p/arcosi) the most successful open source intelligence integration tool for SIEM used by 550+ organizations.

web_presences.title: THREAT STREAM CYBER THREAT INTELLIGENCE FOR ENTERPRISE AND GOVERNMENT
